self_contained_context.background: The installer needs to detect execution context to format output appropriately. This module provides TTY/terminal detection and Claude Code context detection for output formatting decisions.
self_contained_context.technical_context: Create context_detector.py with is_tty() function checking stdout.isatty(), is_claude_code_context() checking CLAUDE_CODE environment variable, and is_interactive() combining both checks. Foundation for output_formatter decisions.

task_specification.name: Context Detector - Terminal/Claude Detection
task_specification.description: Create context_detector.py with TTY/terminal detection and Claude Code context detection. Determines if running in interactive terminal vs non-interactive context.
task_specification.motivation: Different execution contexts require different output formats. Terminal needs human-readable messages, Claude Code needs JSON for parsing.
task_specification.detailed_instructions: 1. Create scripts/install/context_detector.py with is_tty(), is_claude_code_context(), and is_interactive() functions. 2. is_tty() checks sys.stdout.isatty(). 3. is_claude_code_context() checks CLAUDE_CODE environment variable. 4. Create tests/unit/test_context_detector.py with unit tests for each function.
task_specification.acceptance_criteria: No direct acceptance test - validated through AC-05 JSON output scenarios; TTY detection works correctly; Claude Code context detection works correctly
